game.name: PAYDAY 2: Fugitive Weapon Pack
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Remote Play on TV, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 오버킬이 법으로부터 달아나려는 모든 유쾌한 부적응자 집단들을 위해 다양한 무기가 포함된 Fugitive Weapon Pack을 선보입니다. 3개의 무기와(추가로 아킴보 하나) 12개의 개조모드가 포함되어 있습니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: OVERKILL presents the Fugitive Weapon Pack, which offers plenty of firepower for any jolly group of misfits that’s on the run from the law. Includes 3 weapons (plus one akimbo) as well as 12 mods.
